pull.title: Trivial: use EXIT_ codes instead of magic numbers
pull.body: To be consistent with other exit() calls.

events.message:
use EXIT_ codes instead of magic numbers

To be consistent with other exit() calls.

events.body: Yeah why not, wonder why these were not caught in similar previous pulls. Anyhow, utACK https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/9815/commits/a87d02adad2d566927136694dc0d7b202d72691d
They were added after the previous PR taking care of those.

> They were added after the previous PR taking care of those.

Good point.
